column5: I'm considering a trip to Tobin, somtime this fall possibly in September. I've never been there, but understand this is a good time, also would consider fishing a tournament if one is going on around that time frame. Any info would be appreciated. Thanks

Yes and Yes. I didn't have time to post the links, but do a browser search for "Tobin Lake" and "Vanity Cup" and you'll get all the info you need to know. derrek. "It's the weaseling out of things that sets us apart from the animals.... Except the weasel." - H.J. Simpson
I believe the Vanity is in October on the long weekend around the 11th to 13th.

The 2003 Vanity Cup is being held on September 27th & 28th. This is the 10th anniversary of the tournament. Entry fee is $1000 (Can). It is an excellent tournament and pays $50,000 (Can) first place money. If you are going to enter, you'd best hurry as it always fills. You can get info by phoning the Kingfisher Inn @ 306-862-9801. Great fishing that time of year. This year they are paying $1000 each day for the "big fish" caught during pre fishing the week prior to the tournament.
